feed.title: Remember Websites? Man, I Remember Websites.

entry.title: A collection of the coolest tools, technologies, and websitesÂ I've seen
entry.summary: Single Page static website with only css and html - Not what I'm using for this project, but I considered it Pandoc - If you need to convert files from one markup format into another, pandoc is your swiss-army knife Gather - Online meetings that…
entry.content:
Single Page static website with only css and html - Not what I'm using for this project, but I considered it

Pandoc - If you need to convert files from one markup format into another, pandoc is your swiss-army knife

Gather - Online meetings that look like a videogame

Opus databending drumkit

Hosting SQLite databases on Github Pages - (or any static file hoster) - phiresky's blog

The Algorithms - GitHub's largest open-source algorithm library

The Life You Can Save - Best Charities for Effective Giving

Every Noise at Once - Click on any genre to hear a song
